mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.deviceid AS "deviceId", a.rawdata AS "rawData", a.p AS "p", a.pf AS "pF", a.AU AS "aU", a.BU AS "bU", a.CU AS "cU", a.AI AS "aI", a.BI AS "bI", a.CI AS "cI", a.datatime AS "dataTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.name AS "deviceName", b.ratio AS "ratio"
LEFT JOIN energy_devices b ON b.deviceid = a.deviceid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO energy_elec_rawdata( id, deviceid, rawdata, datatime, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deviceId}, #{rawData}, #{dataTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE energy_elec_rawdata SET deviceid = #{deviceId}, rawdata = #{rawData}, datatime = #{dataTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
